mapper.select: SELECT A.DOC_CODE,A.QUIZ_NUMBER,FNC_COMMON_CODE(B.QUIZ_SOURCE) AS QUIZ_SOURCE_NAME, B.QUIZ_ORG_NUMBER, FNC_COMMON_CODE(B.QUIZ_LEVEL) AS QUIZ_LEVEL_NAME, FNC_COMMON_CODE(B.PATTERN_CODE) AS PATTERN_CODE_NAME, FNC_DOC_CATEGORY(B.DOC_CODE) AS DOC_CODE_NAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM QUIZ_STAT C WHERE DOC_CODE=A.DOC_CODE AND QUIZ_NUMBER = A.QUIZ_NUMBER AND SUCCESS_YN <> 'Y') SUCCESS_N, (SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM QUIZ_STAT C WHERE DOC_CODE=A.DOC_CODE AND QUIZ_NUMBER = A.QUIZ_NUMBER AND SUCCESS_YN = 'Y') SUCCESS_Y, (SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM QUIZ_STAT C WHERE DOC_CODE=A.DOC_CODE AND QUIZ_NUMBER = A.QUIZ_NUMBER AND quiz_date = date_format(curdate(),'%Y-%m-%d')) TODAY_YN -- 오늘 푼 문제 FROM QUIZ_DOCUMENT A, QUIZ B WHERE A.DOC_NAME = #{doc_name} AND A.DOC_CODE = B.DOC_CODE AND A.QUIZ_NUMBER = B.QUIZ_NUMBER ORDER BY QUIZ_SOURCE_NAME DESC, CAST(B.QUIZ_NUMBER AS INTEGER) DESC
